g.text: Ice ages occur when orbital cycles (Milankovitch) reduc
e solar heating. Glaciers lock up water, dropping sea l
• Siberian Traps (~252 MYA) - The Great Dying,
• Deccan Traps (~66 MYA) - Contributed to K-Pg
Large Igneous Provinces (LIPs) release sulfur aerosols
blocking sunlight, plus CO2 causing long-term warming a
• Chicxulub (~66 MYA) - K-Pg extinction, end of
Impacts >10km diameter cause global catastrophe. Ejecta
reenters atmosphere, igniting forests. Dust blocks pho
Anoxic events occur when ocean circulation stalls. Bact
eria produce toxic H2S. Purple/green sulfur bacteria do
CO2 and methane trap heat. Ocean pH drops (acidificatio
n), dissolving shells. Thermal stress exceeds organism
Sea level drops when water locks in glaciers or tectoni
c changes alter ocean basin volume. Epicontinental seas
• Late Devonian (~372 MYA) - Reef gap of 100 MY
Reefs are sensitive to temperature, pH, and sediment. R
eef gaps in fossil record last 5-10 million years after
Atmospheric oxygen rises dramatically. Larger body sizes bec
Oxygen levels control maximum body size, especially for
organisms using tracheal breathing. Higher O2 = bigger
Add 2 new tiles of player's choice. First to cla
A new habitat type becomes available for colonization.
• Land colonization (~470 MYA) - Plants, then a
Ecological opportunity drives adaptive radiation. Empty
niches reward early colonizers with reduced competitio
